@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@ - * Copyright (c) 2014, 2019, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. + * Copyright (c) 2014, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. @@ -29,4 +29,3 @@ - *

The JDK implementation of this module includes a language-independent - * command-line script shell, {@index jrunscript jrunscript tool}, - * that supports executing JavaScript and other languages if its corresponding - * script engine is installed. + *

The {@index jrunscript jrunscript tool} included in the JDK + * implementation of this module, has been deprecated for removal since + * JDK 24 and will be removed in a future release.
